languages.text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор отстраненно взмахивает рукой.{/n} "Довольно. Пусть говорит. Чем быстрее мы покончим с этим делом, тем лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Пусть говорит. Инквизиция сама примет решение, что в этом деле имеет значение, а что — нет". {n}Лорд-инквизитор отстраненно взмахивает рукой, прерывая обоих.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."

languages.text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur esquisse un geste dédaigneux de la main.{/n} « Il suffit. Laissez-{mf|le|la} parler. Plus vite nous conclurons cette affaire, mieux ce sera. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur esquisse un geste dédaigneux de la main.{/n} « Il suffit. Laissez-{mf|le|la} parler. Plus vite nous conclurons cette affaire, mieux ce sera. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}大审判官做了个模糊的手势，示意双方噤声。{/n}“够了，让{mf|他|她}说吧，这个案子越早结案越好。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长做了个模糊的手势，示意双方噤声。{/n}“够了，让{mf|他|她}说吧，这个案子越早结案越好。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは、どことなく軽蔑的なそぶりを見せた。{/n}「もう十分だ。{mf|彼|彼女}にしゃべらせろ。この件は早く終わらせた方がいい」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは、どことなく軽蔑的なそぶりを見せた。{/n}「もう十分だ。{mf|彼|彼女}にしゃべらせろ。この件は早く終わらせた方がいい」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}Der Großinquisitor macht vage eine wegwerfende Handbewegung.{/n} "Es reicht. Lasst {mf|ihn|sie} sprechen. Je früher diese Angelegenheit erledigt ist, desto besser."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Großinquisitor macht vage eine wegwerfende Handbewegung.{/n} "Es reicht. Lasst {mf|ihn|sie} sprechen. Je früher diese Angelegenheit erledigt ist, desto besser."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor hace un gesto vagamente despectivo.{/n} «Ya basta. Que hable. Cuando antes concluya este asunto, mucho mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, ortamın sakinleşmesi için hafif bir el hareketi yapıyor.{/n} "Bu kadarı yeterli. Bırakın konuşsun. Bu mesele ne kadar erken sonuçlanırsa o kadar iyi."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor makes a vaguely dismissive gesture.{/n} "Enough. Let {mf|him|her} speak. The sooner this business is concluded, the better."
